sentences.sContent: ...the tactical ineptitude of the allied commander.

synos.tran: 不适当，不合适；不称职；愚笨

remMethod.val: inept(无能的) + itude(表状态) → 无能； 不称职

trans.tranCn: 不适当，不合适；不称职；愚笨
trans.tranOther: If you refer to someone's ineptitude, you are criticizing them because they do something with a complete lack of skill
